circumstances: Following an uneventful flight from Krasnoyarsk-Severny Airport, the crew started the approach to Kansk-Tsentralny but was forced to divert to Kansk-Dalniy Airport due to poor weather conditions. Nevertheless, the crew landed in below-minima weather conditions at Dalniy Airport. After touchdown, the airplane was unable to stop within the remaining distance, overran, collided with an obstacle and came to rest. There were no casualties.
